TopicTitle: How do I add an image to my signature?

Articles.Content: How do I add an image to my signature?
Welcome to the forum @CN Ming Space, you must make 5 posts that are approved by moderators before you can edit your profile. We're sorry but this is a measure to protect the forum.

Once you’ve done the five posts to get full access, you can add images to your signature like this:

  1. Click/tap the arrow to the right of your name in the top right of the screen;
  2. Select “Account Settings”;
  3. Pick “Signature” from the list on the left, then you can add images there as you would to a post- use the “insert image from URL” button and paste in the web link after uploading your pictures to a file sharing site.

This is different to changing your profile picture which is displayed beside your name on every post you make, to change that you pick “Profile” from the drop-down menu in the top right then the photo button on the left to add a profile pic (or the cover photo button on the right for a cover photo).
